descriptionBody:
A 3-bedroom apartment located on the third floor of the modern and prestigious Mirador Business Center development, situated in the Forca district of Aveiro. This is a residential area of growing value that combines tranquility with excellent accessibility and proximity to the city center, green spaces, major road and rail links, as well as all types of services and shops.

Built with contemporary architecture, this apartment is distinguished by its quality finishes and a layout designed to offer maximum comfort and functionality.

The entrance opens into a generous open-plan social area. The modern, fully equipped kitchen with high-quality Bosch appliances integrates harmoniously with the spacious living and dining room. This space benefits from an unobstructed view and large windows that ensure excellent natural light throughout the day. The social area also includes an entrance hall with a video intercom and a guest toilet.

The private area is separated by a sliding door to ensure greater privacy. It consists of a full supporting bathroom, two spacious bedrooms, and a comfortable suite. All bedrooms have built-in wardrobes and access to a balcony.

For added convenience, the property includes two easily accessible underground parking spaces, one of which is equipped for electric vehicle charging. It also has a generous enclosed storage space, providing additional organization and versatility.

The apartment is equipped with air conditioning in all rooms, high-quality window frames and glazing, electric blackouts, a security door, and a spacious elevator, ensuring a high standard of comfort, energy efficiency, and security.

This is the ideal choice for those looking to live with comfort and modernity in the heart of Aveiro, in a property that combines quality, tranquility, and a central location.
